messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: If you need a job, just say so over the radio. You can use the radio by typing say "; hello" into your chatbar.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hello, Crew! I hope you have a wonderful shift on the station. Our current assignment is: A BSA-31. Good luck.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Arm yourselves, or die, either first.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.
